113.content:
You had only just started traveling. A friend was escorting you to the lab to receive your first Pokemon. That was about all you could remember. Right now you were partially tired and had a headache. "What happened?" you muttered as you opened your eyes slowly. It took a few moments for your vision to adjust, but when it did you were convinced that you were still dreaming. "Is that... how is... everything is so big." you stuttered. Indeed everything around you looked like the contents of someone's bedroom. You pinched yourself, and did so again, but the setting remained the same. "This... Is real?"

Before you could ponder this any further the ground started to shake. The vibrations grew more and more powerful until you heard something trying to open the closed door. The door opened and in walked a titanic girl with dark skin and a very large and wide puff of hair going down her back. You wanted to run and hide but you just stood there, frozen in shock and fear. The tremors grew stronger as she walked closer. She stopped right in front of you...

11311222122.content:
As the brown titan’s snorin echoed throughout the room, you started to gently shift, taking extra care not to wake up your massive owner. As beautiful as she was, there was no way you were going to spend the rest of your life as someone pet. Even to a hot girl. You have SOME level of dignity... at least you like to think so.

Iris was still sound asleep as you freed yourself and slid down onto the bed and carefully made your way to the floor. The only sounds were some crickets chirping and Iris’ snoring. You hoped it would stay that way. Lord knows things would be really bad for you if she were to wake up and notice you now. Once you hit the floor, you ran to the door. You didn’t know where the hell you were or how you’d even escape or find a way to get back to normal, but staying here without iris sure as hell wasnt goingg to solve any of those problems. You moved quickly in the dark, keeping an eye out for anything which would be deemed a threat at your size, quietly sliding yourself underneath the door and into a hallway. You sighed as you looked at the long, seemingly endless expanse of room that you’d have to travel even to hide. Knowing you needed to move before she woke up, you stopped the complaints and got moving.

Lots of time passed. While it might take anyone else less than 30 seconds to check every room and reach the end of the hall, you were not anyone else. You were much much smaller than literally anyone else. And a lot of time was wasted crawling under doors that only lead to guest rooms or closets. Hopefully you find it soon before...

And just then the door to iris’s room opened up. You didn’t know if she noticed you were missing yet but you sure as hell weren’t going to stay around where she would spot you either way. Quickly you sprinted to the nearest door, putting all your faith in this being the path to safety.

However, it ended up leading to...
11311222122.title: Attempting to escape

113112221221.content:
As you snuck into the room through the partially opened door you were disappointed to discover that you hadn’t found an escape of any sort, but instead a bathroom. The room itself was fairly large for a bathroom, but had the essentials you'd expect. Toilet, sink, tub and shower, a hamper with Iris’ clothes scattered around the base of.

You were about to sneak back out to check if the coast was clear when suddenly the door flew open. Time stood still. Your heart sped up. This was it. You were dead. You stood there shivering awaiting her to grab you or perhaps stomp on you... but nothing happened. Looking up, you first saw her bare feet before you, the door closing behind them. As you looked up past her loose fitting sleepware you saw her face. To your relief it wasn’t looking down at you. Heck of didn’t seem to be focused on anything. Iris’ expression looked like she was really tired more than anything else. Maybe she didn’t even realize you were missing. This was great except now you saw that this door was too low for you to crawl under. You were trapped. You looked around quickly as Iris started to step over you heading towards...
113112221221.title: Into Iris’ Bathroom

113112221223.content:
As you sprinted into the room, hopefully unnoticed you saw a large room with a desk, some chairs and a large television with some video games hooked up to it. This must have been her living room.

Before you could ponder the matter any further a loud THUD echoed all around you knocking you on your ass. Looking up you saw a towering Iris, barefoot inches from your body, clad in pajamas and staring directly at you with a glare that could terrify the most powerful Dragonite. Your body quivered as she stood over you. “I warned you about disobeying me.” She said in an angry tone. “I... i... m-mistress I was just...” you didn’t know where your explanation was going, but it didn’t matter as she slammed her foot down on the other side of you launching you into the air slightly. “And I warned you about trying to leave.” You remember what she said about punishments for disobeying her three rules. You effectively just broke two of them at once. Whatever she had in store for you you didn’t want to stick around and find out.

Without warning you regained control of your legs and immediately started sprinting. Iris was caught off guard by your sudden burst of speed but the angry glare soon returned. “Hey! Get back here!” You tried to move as fast as your legs could go. Iris caught up to you almost immediately, to mooned surprise. There was no way you were going to outrun her. You had to get out of her reach and fast. Each stomp from her feet came close to throwing you off balance, but you managed to keep running away. You closed in on iris’s sofa. You could probably hide under there briefly as you planned your. Exit move. But who knows if you would even make it that far.
